1.content:
Who do you want to be.


There are many option you can have.
(Pictures are linked for the ones that trust that its only that sometimes with some extra info underneath.)

-Night Kanjy (http://d.facdn.net/art/freake/1526920612...)
This small hybrid is talented in many thing mainly magic to name a thing. He might be small with only 0.3 - 0.8 meters but he can grow and enter many diffrent forms that may or may not be bigger but certanly are more of a danger than he otherwise might be. He mainly falls prey to others but he is a pred add heart which doesn't compliement his nature of kindnes and forgivnes which means that he always digests prey painfully and revives them after he is done aslong as they are intellegent enough.

-Cynder(Kanjy)(http://www.furaffinity.net/view/28415908...)
This kitsune has some tricks up thier sleeves. As she is Night's mate she does the same. Like many of my charakters but she does have a place for someone that uses her. She isn't as forgiving as Night and that can end with someone dead even if intellegent enough. Her magic isn't bad but she knows less but always learns from here mate.

-Acidbreak (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/28738348...)
There is the fluffy or scaly dragon. Its which ever you prefer or if its said its like that.
He normaly only digests and eats willing meals but he sometimes goes for it no matter what.
He revives who he seems worthy of it if he just hunts. His appetide has no end and his digestion is rather quick and painless most of the time thanks to him bieng a poison/acid/crystal dragon. He also is small but don't think he can't get stuff down or done.

-Ima (dragon) (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/28970763...)
This dragon is no joke. He is as big as Acidbreak but he can eat double what he can. Which is about 4.5 times his own hight. He revives whoever he seems worthy aswell. He digests only painless when directly asked to or if its not the first time that his prey is his prey. He keeps the skull of any of his prey that he digested but only the first he gets aslong as it's not broken. He almost allways digests his prey. And hands of Cynder thats no advice thats an order
1.title: Choose who to be.

11.content:
Chose one of the locations where Night is or wakes up in.

Keep in mind that Night would be willing prey for the most part. His prey or victim may not be as lucky. He doesn't rape but he would have sex with someone that's ok with it. He is bisexual.

-Forest
A nice forest to hunt in or be hunted in. There is enought to eat from berries to prey and enought to be eaten by. There may be enough willing to have sex to chose but also sexual preadators that don't let you chose.

-Cave
He wakes up in his home which means he can go anywhere from there. Also anything can happen from a troubled prey to a curiose pred who might enter. And his scent would clearly be around so his gender won't be hidden for anyone intressted in a little something else. Maybe you just want to hang around or do something with your mate.

-Mountain
If hes running,hunting,searching,following or other stuff he might be around. Maybe he is exploring no matter what there should be enough around for anything to happen.

-Plains
What a place to be in. A wide open area with no cover and many ways to be looked at or look at something. There is no limitaitons to what can happen.
11.title: Where are you?

12.content:
She is open to sleep with anyone. For a price of course. Her mate knows it and is fine with it as they both know that diffrent sex partners and vore partners are a good thing to keep it intressting.

-Forest
A nice place to be at. Anything is possible here from running into prey or predator or simplie to find a nice place and rest or find someone intresstng and look where you two end up after some quality time together.

-Cave.
What better place than to start at home. Maybe eat you mate while your still there maybe just have some sex and leave to do something else. Maybe some stranger with unknown intend comes in who knows.

-Beach
Rather your alone or with a partner like a friend or your mate its a nice place to be. Many come and go and sometimes its just fun to swim a bit or do something else like getting dirty.

-Plains
Well what a place to be in. Its easy to be watched and followed or to watch someone or follow them.
What ever intend it might be its not a bad location to start of in.
12.title: What location are you in?

choices: Looking for a victim (rough rape and vore)
A all around good time (sex/rape and vore)
13.content:
What are you doing at the given time the options open up many thing.
(possible thing for that choice) Acidbreak is bisexual. He normaly tops but bottoms for friends if wanted by them.
Acidbreak might be needy sometimes and want something he shouldn't get for what he might do.
He still is a nice person at heart so he will try not to hurt someone while doing something.

-Exploring
He might look around some caves,mountains,forests or other locations to see what he can find and see what to do with someone.

-Hunting
Well he is hungry at first but that should soon change. Still means there is a window for some fun or for more than one prey to be going after.

-Looking for a good time
Well sometimes you just want to have some fun. Could be with a friend or with a stranger. Maybe with an enemy aswell just to show who is the boss around here.

-Looking for a victim
Well sometimes humiliation isn't enough. Maybe he just wants a bit of a rougher time with someone. Maybe he just realy wants to eat someone after a rougher time. Maybe he did bite it so that some kind of toxin makes it weaker or more comfortable to deal with or its just a bit kinky.

-A all around good time
Well maybe vore or sex/rape isn't enough than why not do both. Might be a bit more of a chalange or just a better time than just doing one thing just not rough with any of them.
13.title: What are you doing ?

14.content:
Ima wakes up. His stomach growels loudly as he looks around he was hungry and he was home.
His brother stayed at their old home he would have made a good meal.
They like it both to do it just that he was quicker and a bit more sneaky while his brother was a lot more on the safe side as he isn't at all like him going for it when the time seems right.
But enough of that his growling belly brought him back to present time as his thoughts were interupted by them. Looking around he sees that there wasn't to much left of the berries that he had stored.

„Well time to go hunting I guess" He sais to himself slowly moving to the entrance of his home.
14.title: Hunger awakens you.

15.content:
Marlon the shapeshifter/dragontamer (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/28931289...)
Well he isn't realy up to the task but hey he might get eaten or used. He might not even have something against it aslong as its a friend or a dragon.

Stardust (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/28422781...)
This dragon likes foxes and human the most. Not just around but in his gut too snd as mush and bones but he will revive them without a doubt.. While he is nice most of the times he doesn't always play by those rules. While he only would go and have sex with a friend if its his will he can be used by others aslong as they are ready to get eaten afterwards but thats a secret so keep it.

Voidspike (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/27653120...)
Well Ima's brother needs to be in here. He kinda is a prey for the most part. While he can be a pred he normaly doesn't go for it but he can. Pretty sure his prey will feel helpless. He might revive you if he feels like it if your not a friend of him. Well feel fre to use him as you like it but hands of Cynder he will be killed and won't come back if he touches her at all.

Syeon (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/29085202...)
Here we have that one sylveon i have. He uses magic most of the time so he is experienced with vore. While he has no real friend he knows Night. He is a pred for the most part and while seek revenge if he is unhappy about you digesting him so stay safe with him. He is a bit tricky to handle if he is doing stuff.
15.title: Who though ?

choices: Meet a friend (eat a friend,get eaten or fuck)
151.content:
-Dragontaming
You could go and tame a unknown dragon or visit a known one "play" a bit.

-Meet a friend
So much possible to do with one. Whatever happens you will be fine in the end which doesn't mean you can't get digested.

-Specialtaming
It's how taming ends most of the time you getting dumped somewhere having to revive and find something else to do. Or admire your remains which also can be nice if your into it.
151.title: But what to do?

152.content:
It happens again. You had eaten your pet/friend fox and what now. The reform spell didn't work.
Atleast you feel great otherwise and full but you lost this one somehow and it shouldn't be you doing it wrong you did it like any other time and that works with anything else just not him. Well that really isn't that bad he wasn't all to intressting either way and like this you still could get his skull if you want to or just wait till its gone to and you will lose memory of him thanks to how forgetible he actualy was but that would happen even if you have his skull.

What to do next. You don't feel hungry but he was little more than a snack and now he was allmost gone still not very sad about that. Thirst was there but not realy all to unforgiving you could go without a drink for now. Having little ideas you go outside and breath in the nice and fresh air. Your cave was warmer but you were not cold or freezing it was still about the temperature of a normal being.
152.title: Waking up.

choices: Take a nap and dicide afterwards.
153.content:
Your brother recently moved out of your shared cave. He would come back sooner than later but he wants to explore the world without you for some time. Without him there wasn't much to do other than to something unusual like hunting or befriending someone new.

No matter what it was up to you and just you. Your were free of your brother for sometime now but you just couldn't dicide right away.
153.title: All alone !

154.content:
Syeon wakes up from his sleep and takes a look around as he sees them all.
Statues everywhere along his caves walls and where they were not was either room for more or
some crystels or something else looking good in the room.
He made these with his own magic to see what he had eaten everytime something new came
to his list a new statue would be made and put down in his sleeping room.

He yawns. „What a night that was" He says to himself and his belly. He pushes his belly with one of the ribbons squishing it a bit. It was still all mushy from his former meal only thing still in there were bones and the skull. It did take good care of his prey which he might want to revive. He could also get the bones and such out or wait till these were gone too. „Thirsty" runs trough his mind as he fells thirsty for some water.
154.title: Statues

info.brief_description: This will contain vore and stuff like scat and digestion. Add whoever and what you want.
info.description:
This may contain everything aslong as allowence is there. I sadly cant stop anyone from stealing a character or race but thats how it is.

You can add any kind of vore other than hard(chewing) including anal,cock and vaginal to the normal oral vore. Breast and bladder vore and that sort of stuff is also allowed. Sex willing and unwilling is partly allowed.

Scat and digestion should be taged in the chosing next option.

Pleas try not to offend anyone and keep it welcome to others. And try to stay with the already existing story.

Hope you have fun and joy from this.
